02c5467a-4c9f-4708-86c7-20ca782d8d92.name: Muzeiko
02c5467a-4c9f-4708-86c7-20ca782d8d92.description: Children's museum featuring interactive science-related exhibits, a cafe & a gift shop.

0a4c0be2-e549-49e8-9d4e-d9881080009f.name: Nacional History Museum
0a4c0be2-e549-49e8-9d4e-d9881080009f.description: The National Historical Museum in Sofia is Bulgaria's largest museum. It was founded on 5 May 1973. A new representative exhibition was opened in the building of the Court of Justice on 2 March 1984, to commemorate the 13th centenary of the Bulgarian state

0b38c0d5-5a00-4aff-80dc-cfbb692e9db1.name: Sait Sofia
0b38c0d5-5a00-4aff-80dc-cfbb692e9db1.description: The church was built on the site of several earlier churches from the 4th century, and places of worship dating back to the days when it was the necropolis of the Roman town of Serdica.

58686ce8-3ebb-4aa3-8480-65900630643f.name: Boyana Waterfall
58686ce8-3ebb-4aa3-8480-65900630643f.description: Boyana Waterfall is the largest waterfall in the Bulgarian Vitosha mountain, with a height of 25 meters.

626a4614-f668-48ea-b646-1fe70f1b325d.name: Museum of illusions
626a4614-f668-48ea-b646-1fe70f1b325d.description: It's fascinating. It's fun. It's sure to be surprising. 400 m2 full of riveting illusions, wonderful atmosphere and helpful staff.

65bb5bae-3402-48e8-870a-2524efff998c.name: Sofia Zoo
65bb5bae-3402-48e8-870a-2524efff998c.description: It's fascinating. It's fun. It's sure to be surprising. 400 m2 full of riveting illusions, wonderful atmosphere and helpful staff.

8c2658a9-bae8-4943-ae08-01755ad64129.name: Rila Manastry and 7 Rila lakes
8c2658a9-bae8-4943-ae08-01755ad64129.description: The Seven Rila Lakes are a group of glacial lakes, situated in the northwestern Rila Mountain in Bulgaria. They are the most visited group of lakes in Bulgaria. The lakes are situated between 2,100 and 2,500 metres elevation above sea level. Each lake carries a name associated with its most characteristic feature.,

a0f8a448-9e9a-475c-a303-7969f60dee6d.name: Kapana
a0f8a448-9e9a-475c-a303-7969f60dee6d.description: Kapana is a charming arts and cultural destination where cobblestone streets give way to restored buildings with art galleries and specialty shops. Patrons flock to sidewalk patios at an array of bakeries, diverse eateries and gastropubs that serve everything from classic regional eats to French cuisine. Kapana Fest showcases performers and artists each August.

62cde487-6b82-468f-bdbf-fcfe2d7c779b.name: Dolphinarium
62cde487-6b82-468f-bdbf-fcfe2d7c779b.description: Yes, you can swim with dolphins. Dolphins can have fun.
